data.name: World of Warplanes -I-16-29 Pack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside Steam.

Jump at the excellent opportunity to break into battle on a universal aircraft with an experienced pilot!
The I-16 type 29 has excellent maneuverability for its Tier which makes it easy to tear your enemies apart in the melee combat.
Although its forward-firing weapons are a little bit weaker than those of its researchable counterparts, it has long overheating time and deals good damage in close combat.
Low altitudes will be optimal for this aircraft, where its maneuverability and the ability to carry bombs and rockets at the same time make this warbird a truly universal vehicle.

DLC Content:

  • I-16 Type 29, USSR Tier IV multirole fighter: having all characteristics of I-16 this aircraft is additionally equipped with bombs and rockets, which gives the opportunity to be effective in any combat situation
  • Hangar slot: allows you to put your warbird in the Hangar
  • X20 Universal Ammunition: increases chances of causing fire and inflicting critical damage
  • X10 Incendiary Ammunition: maximizes chances of causing fire and increases chances of inflicting critical damage
  • 1 day of Premium Account: earn even more credits and experience in every battle
  • Customization set: a unique paint scheme, emblem and nose art.

data.short_description: Jump at the excellent opportunity to break into battle on a universal aircraft with an experienced pilot!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Greek, Danish, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish*, Portuguese, Romanian, Turkish, Finnish, Czech*, Swedish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2xxx or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shaders 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT 512MB, Radeon HD 3870) / higher)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2ххх, AMD FX 8xxx / higher Shaders 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT 512MB, Radeon HD 3870) / higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 1GB, Radeon HD 7870 / higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768
